Articles.Content:
I am kind of new to mods and had some trouble installing a few visual mods. My parts are GTX 1660 Super, Ryzen 5 3600, 16GB RAM. Could you please recommend visual mods that aren't too hardware heavy, but also look good? I would like to be able play at a steady 60fps.

P.S: Also including everything the mod needs to work would be much appreciated.
